patterns: How many years does it take to complete the imtech cse course?
In which domains, can i specialize in  cse course?
responses:
The Integrated M.Tech. program is a 5-year integrated program intended for students who have completed or are completing Plus Two (or equivalent). At the end of five years of the program, successful students get dual degrees of B.Tech and M.Tech.
The courses in iMTech CSE cover wide range of core topics including algorithms, automata theory, discrete maths,  Computer Architecture, Digital Design, Computer Networking, Operating systems, and current technology topics such as Artificial intelligence, Machine learning, Approximate algorithms, Software defined network, Real time operating systems and many others.

patterns: How many years does it take to complete the imtech ece course?
In which domains, can i specialize in ece course?
responses:
The Integrated M.Tech. program is a 5-year integrated program intended for students who have completed or are completing Plus Two (or equivalent). At the end of five years of the program, successful students get dual degrees of B.Tech and M.Tech.
The courses in iMTech ECE cover wide range of core topics including Circuit theory, Digital Communication, Microprocessor and microcontrollers, Computer Architecture, Digital Design, Computer Networking, Operating systems, and current technology topics such as Artificial intelligence, Machine learning, ASIC design, Processor Architecture, VLSI subsystems, Robotics, Real time operating systems and many others.
